content:
衛生福利部民國107年7月20日 衛部秘字第1072161286號通知單註銷密等
@1342 1
中華民國內政部 MINISTRY OF INTERIOR REPUBLIC OF CHINA TAIWAN, CHINA
Ref. Ts-TA(Chen,cy)
15 May 1963
Dr. I. C. Fang Director WPRO/WHO Manila, P. I.
5
Dear Dr. Fang,
...
Please refer to my letter to you dated 6 February 1963 concerning Mr. Eugene Chen. His formal WHO fellowship letter of award is now enclosed for your cancellation.
As stated in my letter, there will be a substitute candidate. ... I am now submitting 3 copies of Mrs. (Eva) Chao-yuan Chen Chang's application forms who is nominated to take Mr. Eugene Chen's fellowship under 1962 TA program for your consideration and approval.
Sincerely yours, Sgd. C. K. Chang C. K. Chang, M.D. ,M.P.H. Director Department of Health Administration
...
Encl .: as stated Qc: Dr. T. C. Hsu Dr. A. H. Penington
D
0 916
Academnja Historici
19

lines.content: 衛生福利部民國107年7月20日
衛部秘字第1072161286號通知單註銷密等
Please refer to my letter to you dated 6 February 1963
concerning Mr. Eugene Chen. His formal WHO fellowship letter of
award is now enclosed for your cancellation.
As stated in my letter, there will be a substitute candidate.
... I am now submitting 3 copies of Mrs. (Eva) Chao-yuan Chen Chang's
application forms who is nominated to take Mr. Eugene Chen's fellowship
under 1962 TA program for your consideration and approval.

paragraphs.content: 衛生福利部民國107年7月20日 衛部秘字第1072161286號通知單註銷密等
中華民國內政部 MINISTRY OF INTERIOR REPUBLIC OF CHINA TAIWAN, CHINA
Dr. I. C. Fang Director WPRO/WHO Manila, P. I.
Please refer to my letter to you dated 6 February 1963 concerning Mr. Eugene Chen. His formal WHO fellowship letter of award is now enclosed for your cancellation.

As stated in my letter, there will be a substitute candidate. ... I am now submitting 3 copies of Mrs. (Eva) Chao-yuan Chen Chang's application forms who is nominated to take Mr. Eugene Chen's fellowship under 1962 TA program for your consideration and approval.
Sincerely yours, Sgd. C. K. Chang C. K. Chang, M.D. ,M.P.H. Director Department of Health Administration
Encl .: as stated Qc: Dr. T. C. Hsu Dr. A. H. Penington
